r.d: The class allows you to: * check if an address is an IPv6 address * compress/uncompress IPv6 addresses * check for an IPv4 compatible ending in an IPv6 address * check the assigned address space of an IPv6 address * do netmask calculations
r.n: + New method isCompressible() + New method separate() + compress() got a second parameter to enforce compression + add new address types - deprecated getPrefixLength() (technical identical to getNetmaskSpec) - deprecated removePrefixLength() (technical identical to removeNetmaskSpec)
